org.rsna.ctp.pipeline

Class Quarantine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.rsna.ctp.pipeline.Quarantine

  • public class Quarantine
extends java.lang.Object
    A singleton class representing the quarantine directories and providing methods for inserting FileObjects.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected Quarantine(java.io.File directory, long timeDepth)
      Create a Quarantine object for a directory, creating the directory and the index if necessary.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Quarantine getInstance(java.io.File directory,
                     long timeDepth)
        Get the Quarantine object for a directory.
        Parameters:
        directory - the base directory of the quarantine.
        timeDepth - the maximum time depth of the quarantine in days.
        Returns:
        the Quarantine object for the directory, or null if the Quarantine object cannot be created.

             QueueManager queueManager)
        Queue a file in the Quarantine to a QueueManager.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to queue
        queueManager - the QueueManager to receive the file.

      • insert

        public boolean insert(java.io.File file)
        Move a File to the quarantine directory.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to quarantine.
        Returns:
        true if the move was successful, false otherwise.

      • insert

        public boolean insert(FileObject fileObject)
        Move a FileObject to the quarantine directory, modifying the FileObject itself to point to the new file's new location.
        Parameters:
        fileObject - the object to quarantine.
        Returns:
        true if the move was successful, false otherwise.

      • insertCopy

        public boolean insertCopy(FileObject fileObject)
        Move a copy of a FileObject to the quarantine directory, leaving the FileObject pointing to the object's original location.
        Parameters:
        fileObject - the object to quarantine.
        Returns:
        true if the move was successful, false otherwise.

      • getStudies

        public QStudy[] getStudies()
        Get the array of QStudy objects, sorted in natural order..

      • getStudy

        public QStudy getStudy(java.lang.String studyUID)
        Get the QStudy corresponding to a studyUID..
        Parameters:
        studyUID - the UID of the study (for a DICOM study, the StudyInstanceUID).
        Returns:
        the QStudy, or null if the QStudy is not in the quarantine.

      • getSeries

        public QSeries[] getSeries(QStudy study)
        Get the array of QSeries objects in a QStudy, sorted in natural order.
        Parameters:
        study - the QStudy.
        Returns:
        the array of QSeries objects in the QStudy, or the empty array if the QStudy has no QSeries.

      • getSeries

        public QSeries getSeries(java.lang.String seriesUID)
        Get the QSeries corresponding to a seriesUID..
        Parameters:
        seriesUID - the UID of the QSeries (for a DICOM study, the SeriesInstanceUID).
        Returns:
        the QSeries, or null if the QSeries is not in the quarantine.

      • getFiles

        public QFile[] getFiles(QSeries series)
        Get the array of QFile objects in a QSseries, sorted in natural order.
        Parameters:
        series - the QSseries.
        Returns:
        the array of QFile objects in the QSseries, or the empty array if the QSseries has no QFiles.

      • getFiles

        public java.io.File[] getFiles()
        Get an array of all the files in the quarantine index, sorted in natural order.

      • getFile

        public java.io.File getFile(java.lang.String filename)
        Get the file in the quarantine corresponding to a filename. This method only finds files in the quarantine directory.
        Parameters:
        filename - the name of the file.
